entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAot] Objective-C Marshal: find method handle when propagating exceptions #80985
  • Reduce overhead of the threadpool task dispatching. #80984
  • Reduce tendency of the threadpool to consume extra CPU resources when it is not helpful. #80983
  • Make big endian, little endian chosable in BitConverter #80982
  • Allow specialization for typeof(T) pattern in Mono AOT compiler #80980
    Future
  • Introduce symbol stripping build task for HelloiOS sample app #80977
    8.0.0
  • error CS0006: Metadata file '.../maccatalyst-arm64/StartupHookForFunctionalTest.dll' could not be found #80976
  • Different class layout for LayoutKind.Explicit in .NET 7 #80973
  • [JIT] Bool optimization case #80966
    Future
  • Single-file host tracing should include version and/or commit hash #80961

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: implicit cast ValueTask<T> to ValueTask #67212
    Future
  • Allow an await to capture the current TaskScheduler instead of the current SynchronizationContext #47433
    Future
  • Task-Like custom implementation breaks AsyncLocal data #56594
    Future
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Extensions: Missing net standard 2.1 type forwarders in Nuget Package #59021
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make the Task.CancellationToken property public #62006
    Future
  • Please Introduce Specifier for Task to run it in P or L Core. #65659
    Future
  • Object reference not set to an instance of an object exception in NotifySynchronizationContextOfCompletion() #40463
    Future
  • Dataflow TransformBlock cannot accept messages while Link predicates goes well. #37125
    Future
  • Feature Request : Eliminate unpredictable stacktraces when the same Exception object is being concurrently re-thrown #32009
    Future
  • jitstress failure from recent pred list changes #80974
    8.0.0
  • Question: does CLR support for coroutines make sense? #1651
    Future
  • API Request: Method to temporarily disable Task synchronization #1448
    Future
  • Tasks.Dataflow - Aggregation Block and Rendezvous Block #31531
    Future
  • Proposal: Asynchronously cancel a CancellationTokenSource #23405
    Future
  • Tasks.Dataflow SourceObservable onError behaviour differs from standard Rx operators #31236
    Future
  • [mono][interp] Offset allocation of call args is incorrect #80175
    8.0.0
  • JIT further Boolean logic optimization #55605
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Dataflow SourceBlock<T> #80915

PullRequests

Created

  • Change how a task stress test is disabled #80981
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • [wasm] testing fix #80979
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • Propagate cancellation tokens to TrySetCanceled in Dataflow #80978
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • NativeAOT: Optimize static fields of gc types #80969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add gsharedvt wrapper punchthrough to jiterpreter #80968
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Ignore the property with JsonIgnore when generating source code #80967
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Vectorize ProbabilisticMap.IndexOfAny #80963
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512

Merged

  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [mono][loader] Set status on success #80949
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • JIT: fix jit stress failures in `fgSetBlockOrder` #80975
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Extend Mono.ValueTuple to 7 arguments. #80972
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add suppression for CS8500 to test reflection/regression/github_25697 #80964
  • [mono][interp] Ensure call offset is greater than offset of other active calls #80728
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle Span<T>.Length and ReadOnlySpan<T>.Length as intrinsic #80932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Change the default trimmode here too #80940
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Guard leading/trailing zero count #80913
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Final removal of uses of Windows wide char printing #80758
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] Objective-C exception propagation #80334
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Set `TrimMode=full` for tests #80944
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Remove "promoted struct death vars" map #80501
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add expected output tests for regex source generator #80937
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm][debugger][libs] Documentation: How to debug library tests #77368
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Reduce redundant moves with calls #79905
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • WASM Toolchain Support for ARM64 #80955
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: reset max bbnum after failed inline attempt #80958
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80939
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow forced building of mobile manifest pkgs, outside mobile builds #80920
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Forbid creation of non-faulting null-check nodes. #77078
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
